Module ChessTournament
Package ntnu.idatt2001.k2g9.player

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2001.k2g9.player.Admin
public class Admin extends Object
Class that represents an Admin in the application. Contains an ArrayList of all the tournaments the admin organises. Also contains login in information.
